text: The Accountant 2 is an upcoming American action thriller movie. It is expected to be shown at South by Southwest on March 8, 2025 and then released on April 25, 2025. It was directed by Gavin O'Connor and produced by Ben Affleck, Lynette Howell Taylor, and Mark Williams. It is the sequel to the 2016 movie The Accountant. The movie follows Christian Wolff and his brother Braxton as they team up and attempt to solve the murder of Ray King, director of the financial crimes bureau in the Treasury Department. Principal photography for the movie started in California on March 25, 2024 and ended on May 1. == Cast == ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2025 movies Category:2020s action thriller movies Category:2020s English-language movies Category:American action thriller movies Category:American sequel movies Category:Movies about assassinations Category:Movies about autism Category:Movies about brothers Category:Movies about dysfunctional families Category:Movies about embezzlement Category:Movies about security and surveillance Category:Movies set in Illinois Category:Movies set in Washington, D.C. title: The Accountant 2
